scripts.setup: npm install && pip3 install -r extract/requirements.txt && mkdir -p session uploads extract && echo 'âœ… Setup complete â€” all dependencies installed and folders ready!'
scripts.reset: rm -rf session property-system-session.data.json extract/__pycache__ && mkdir -p session && echo 'â™»ï¸ Old sessions cleared. Ready for fresh setup!' && npm run setup
scripts.update: git pull origin main && npm install && pip3 install -r extract/requirements.txt && pm2 restart property-system && echo 'ðŸš€ Update complete â€” system restarted successfully!'
scripts.deploy: npm run reset && npm run update && echo 'ðŸš€ Full deployment completed successfully!'
